reviewText: I bought this set thinking it was a two-volume set (as stated), but was delighted to discover that it is a two-volume DVD set! This should be specified in the description, but I was pleased because the gift can be viewed in detail rather than read and pictured. Was thrilled to give this as a gift!

Very well put together DVD. Gives various examples of detailing and weathering many different types of cars. Highly recommended for the train model enthusiast. A sure way to expand your weathering skills.
